subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: If you want to find Melky Cabrera, just look for Robinson Cano. Chances are Cabrera will be with him. "They're like shadows of each other," said Alex Rodriguez. "I call him 'The Shadow.' They're always together, tied at the hip."
snippet: If you want to find Melky Cabrera, just look for Robinson Cano. Chances are Cabrera will be with him. "They're like shadows of each other," said Alex Rodriguez. "I call him 'The Shadow.' They're always together, tied at the hip."
